verses.text: Ayic schanhil ab'il yoch winhaj Joacim, yuninal winhaj Josías reyal t'a Judá, ix lolon Jehová t'ayin ix yalan icha tik:

Ik'cot junok b'aj tzach tz'ib'ani. Tza tz'ib'an masanil tas ix wal t'a yib'anh Israel yet' t'a yib'anh Judá yet' t'a yib'anh masanil nación, yictax ix in chaanel yich walan t'ayach t'a stiempoal winhaj Josías masanto ticnaik.
Talaj ayic ol yab'an heb' aj Judá, yuj juntzanh yaelal tzin na' t'a yib'anh heb' tik, ol yactancan schucal b'eyb'al heb', yic icha chi' ol aj wak'an niwank'olal smul heb', xchi Jehová.
Ix wavtancot winhaj Baruc yuninal winhaj Nerías. Ix walan t'a winh masanil tas ix yal Jehová t'ayin, ix stz'ib'ancan winh.
Ixlajwi chi' ix walan t'a winh icha tik: Ilnab' wal tas waji, tzin cachjioch waan in b'at t'a stemplo Jehová.

Yuj chi', ayic ol jawok sk'ual tzek'ojk'olal junelxo, tzach b'at t'a yamaq'uil stemplo Jehová. Ata' ol avtej tas ix in chec a tz'ib'ej tik, yic wach' a masanil heb' aj Jerusalén yet' masanil heb' cajan t'a yol yic Judá ol jawok t'a tik, ol yab' slolonel Jehová heb'.

Talaj syalxi sb'a heb' anima tik t'a Jehová chi', syactancan schucal b'eyb'al heb'. Yujto nab'ilxo yuj Jehová to te niwan yowal sk'ool ol yak'cot t'a yib'anh juntzanh anima tik, xin chi t'a winhaj Baruc chi'.
Ix sk'ulan winhaj Baruc chi' masanil tas ix wal chi' t'ay. Ix b'at winh t'a stemplo Jehová, ix yavtan slolonel Jehová chi' winh, aton tas ix stz'ib'ej winh chi'.

Ha t'a sb'alunhil uj t'a yoil ab'il yoch winhaj Joacim yuninal winhaj Josías reyal t'a Judá, ata' ix sna winhaj Joacim chi' to a heb' anima cajan t'a Jerusalén yet' juntzanhxo heb' ix cot t'a juntzanhxo chonhab' t'a yol yic Judá, yowalil tz'och heb' t'a tzek'ojk'olal t'a yichanh Jehová.

Axo winhaj Baruc ix awtan tas ix in chec stz'ib'ej, yic syab' masanil anima. Ha t'a jun amak' chaanh yajk'e t'a stemplo Jehová t'a stz'ey jun ak' puerta b'aj ay scuarto winhaj Gemarías winh tz'ib'um, winh yuninal winhaj Safán, ata' ix yavtej winh.
Ha winhaj Micaías yuninal winhaj Gemarías, yixchiquin winhaj Safán, ix yab' winh masanil slolonel Jehová ix yavtej winhaj Baruc chi'.

Yuj chi' ix b'at winh t'a spalacio winh rey, t'a scuarto winh tz'ib'um, b'aj molanek' heb' winh niwac yopisio: Aton winhaj Elisama tz'ib'um, winhaj Delaía yuninal winhaj Semaías, winhaj Elnatán yuninal winhaj Acbor, winhaj Gemarías yuninal winhaj Safán, winhaj Sedequías yuninal winhaj Ananías yet' masanil heb' ayoch t'a yopisio chi'.
Ix yalan winhaj Micaías chi' masanil tas ix yab' yuj tas tz'ib'ab'il yuj winhaj Baruc chi', ayic ix yavtan winh t'a yichanh heb' anima.

Axo heb' winh niwac yopisio chi' ix checanb'at winhaj Jehudí yuninal winhaj Netanías, yixchiquin winhaj Selemías yinhtilal winhaj Cusi, yic b'at yalan winh t'a winhaj Baruc chi', yic syik'cot tas tz'ib'ab'il chi' yuj winh, aton jun ix yavtej winh t'a yichanh heb' anima. Yuj chi' ix yik'cot jun b'aj tz'ib'ab'il chi' winhaj Baruc chi' t'a yichanh heb' winh.
Ix yalan heb' winh icha tik: --Emanh k'ojan, tzavtan cab'i tas ix a tz'ib'ej chi', xchi heb' winh. Ix yavtan winh.

Ha wal yic ix yab'an juntzanh chi' heb' winh, ix xiv heb' winh, ix och k'eljab' heb' winh t'ay junjun, ix yalan heb' winh icha tik t'a winh: --Yowalil ol kal juntzanh tik t'a winh rey, xchi heb' winh.
Ix sk'anb'an heb' winh t'a winh icha tik: --Al t'ayonh, ¿tas ix utej a tz'ib'an juntzanh tik? ¿Am winhaj Jeremías ix alan t'ayach? xchi heb' winh.
Ix tak'wi winh t'a heb' winh icha tik: --Aton winhaj Jeremías ix alan t'ayin, ix in tz'ib'ancan yet' tinta, xchi winh.
Ix yalan heb' winh icha tik: --B'at k'ub'ejel a b'a yet' winhaj Jeremías chi', malajocab' mach tz'ojtacaneli b'aj tzex k'ochi, xchi heb' winh.
Ix yak'ancan tas tz'ib'ab'il heb' winh ay yopisio chi' t'a scuarto winhaj Elisama winh tz'ib'um, ix b'at yalan masanil juntzanh chi' heb' winh t'a winh rey t'a yamaq'uil spalacio.

Ixlajwi chi' ix checjib'at winhaj Jehudí yuj winh rey chi' yic b'at yik'ancot winh tas tz'ib'ab'il yuj winhaj Baruc chi', jun ix kan t'a scuarto winhaj Elisama. Ayic ix jawi winh yet'oc, ix yavtan winh t'a yichanh winh rey chi' yet' t'a yichanh masanil heb' ay yopisio chi', oyanek' heb' smaclan yab'i.
Yujto sb'alunhil uj yoch jun ab'il chi', yuj chi' ayek' winh rey t'a scuarto b'aj tz'aj t'a stiempoal siic. Axo t'a yichanh winh ayoch jun yet'tal tzak'ak', chac xeinac yaj te' t'a yool.

Ayic ix lajwi yavtan winhaj Jehudí oxe', ma chanhe' makan tz'ib'ab'il chi', ix scotac polanb'at winh rey juntzanh toxo ix avtaj chi' yet' jun pol-lab' sk'an heb' tz'ib'um. Ix yak'anoch winh t'a yol k'ak' chi'. Icha chi' ix aj snhusantz'a masanil tas tz'ib'ab'il chi' winh.
Wach'chom ix yab' winh rey yet' heb' ayek' chi' yet' winh tas ix yal jun tz'ib'ab'il chi', palta maj xiv jab'oc heb', maj sch'oxel scusk'olal heb' yuj.
Ha winhaj Elnatán, winhaj Delaía yet' winhaj Gemarías ix tewi heb' winh t'a winh rey chi' yic max snhustz'a winh, palta maj schalaj yab' winh tas ix yal heb' winh.

Tonhej ix yal winh rey chi' t'a winhaj Jerameel yinhtilal heb' rey, t'a winhaj Seraías yuninal winhaj Azriel yet' t'a winhaj Selemías yuninal winhaj Abdeel, yic tzin ik'jicot a in Jeremías in tik yet' winh in tz'ib'um aj Baruc chi'. Palta a Jehová onh k'ub'aneli.
Ayic toxo ix snhustz'a tas tz'ib'ab'il winh rey chi', aton juntzanh lolonel ix in chec stz'ib'ej winhaj Baruc, ix lolonxi Jehová t'ayin, ix yalan icha tik:
Ik'cot junocxo b'aj ol a tz'ib'ejxi juntzanh lolonel ix ak' tz'ib'chaj t'a sb'ab'elal chi', aton ix snhustz'a winhaj Joacim sreyal Judá.

Tzalan pax juntzanh lolonel tik t'a winh rey chi' icha tik: Icha wal tik yalan Jehová: Ha ach tik, ix a nhustz'a tas tz'ib'ab'il, ix a tuman pax winhaj Jeremías, yujto ix stz'ib'ej winh to ol jawok winh sreyal Babilonia ul satel jun nación tik, manhxa junok anima, ma junok nok' nok' ol canoc.
Yuj chi' a in wal Jehová in swal t'ayach ach Joacim sreyal Judá, malaj junok inhtilal ol cannhej t'a sdespacho winhaj Dawid. Ha a niwanil ol kan telan t'a yoc k'u yet' t'a skal sical t'ak'walil.

Ha ach tik yet' inhtilal yet' pax heb' ayoch yajalil ed'oc, ol wak'och yaelal t'a eyib'anh yuj he mul. Ol ja t'a yib'anh heb' aj Jerusalén yet' t'a yib'anh heb' cajan t'a Judá juntzanh yaelal toxo ix walcan tik, aton juntzanh maj he cha eyab'i, xchi Jehová, xa chi, xchi t'ayin.

Ixlajwi chi', ix wik'anxicot junxo b'aj stz'ib'chaj tastac, ix wak'an t'a winhaj Baruc winh in tz'ib'um, ix stz'ib'an winh tastac ix wala', aton tastac tz'ib'ab'il t'a juntzanh ix snhustz'a winhaj rey Joacim chi'. Ayto pax stz'acub' tas walnac chi' ix tz'ib'aji.
